statements: SELECT report_id, report_name, total_assets FROM portfolio_performance_reports;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_performance_reports WHERE portfolio_id = 1001;
SELECT report_date, total_investments FROM portfolio_performance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, total_assets FROM portfolio_performance_reports WHERE total_assets > 1000000;
SELECT DISTINCT total_assets FROM portfolio_performance_reports;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_performance_reports WHERE total_assets > 100000 ORDER BY total_investments DESC, report_date ASC
SELECT report_name, total_assets FROM portfolio_performance_reports WHERE portfolio_id = 10 ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT portfolio_id, report_date FROM portfolio_performance_reports WHERE total_investments < 50000 AND total_assets BETWEEN 20000 AND 50000 ORDER BY report_id ASC
SELECT AVG(total_investments) AS avg_investments, MAX(total_assets) AS max_assets FROM portfolio_performance_reports GROUP BY portfolio_id HAVING max_assets > 150000
SELECT * FROM portfolio_performance_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' OR report_name LIKE '%Q4%' ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT * FROM portfolio_performance
SELECT portfolio_id, return, date FROM portfolio_performance ORDER BY return DESC
SELECT portfolio_id, date, return FROM portfolio_performance WHERE return > 0.05
SELECT * FROM asset_allocation WHERE percentage >= 0.2
SELECT portfolio_id, COUNT(asset_id) AS num_assets FROM asset_allocation GROUP BY portfolio_id
SELECT * FROM portfolio_performance WHERE portfolio_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_performance WHERE return > 0 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT portfolio_id, SUM(percentage) AS total_percentage FROM asset_allocation GROUP BY portfolio_id;
SELECT asset_id, AVG(percentage) AS average_percentage FROM asset_allocation GROUP BY asset_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT p.portfolio_id, a.asset_id, p.return, aa.percentage FROM portfolio_performance p JOIN asset_allocation aa ON p.portfolio_id = aa.portfolio_id ORDER BY p.return DESC, aa.percentage ASC;
SELECT id, name, return FROM portfolio_performance WHERE id = 1
SELECT date, return FROM portfolio_performance WHERE name = 'Portfolio A' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM asset_allocation WHERE percentage > 20 ORDER BY category ASC
SELECT id, return_rate FROM investment_returns WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT name, return, date FROM portfolio_performance WHERE return > 0.05 ORDER BY return DESC
SELECT * FROM portfolio_performance WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, return FROM portfolio_performance ORDER BY return DESC;
SELECT category, SUM(percentage) AS total_percentage FROM asset_allocation GROUP BY category;
SELECT id, date FROM investment_returns WHERE return_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT name, date, return_rate FROM portfolio_performance pp JOIN investment_returns ir ON pp.date = ir.date;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_performance;
SELECT date, performance, portfolio_name FROM portfolio_performance WHERE performance > 1000;
SELECT portfolio_name, performance FROM portfolio_performance ORDER BY performance DESC;
SELECT date, portfolio_name FROM portfolio_performance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(performance) AS avg_performance FROM portfolio_performance;
SELECT * FROM investment_returns WHERE return > 100.00
SELECT portfolio_name, SUM(performance) FROM portfolio_performance GROUP BY portfolio_name
SELECT DISTINCT portfolio_name FROM asset_allocation ORDER BY portfolio_name DESC
SELECT user_name, email FROM user_info WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM investment_returns WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks'
SELECT * FROM portfolio_performance;
SELECT portfolio_name, performance_score FROM portfolio_performance ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT asset_name, allocation_percentage FROM asset_allocation WHERE portfolio_id = 2;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM client_details WHERE client_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT MAX(performance_value) AS max_performance FROM performance_history;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_performance ORDER BY performance_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT portfolio_name, performance_score FROM portfolio_performance WHERE performance_score > 0.8;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM client_details WHERE client_id = 1001;
SELECT asset_name, allocation_percentage FROM asset_allocation WHERE portfolio_id = 2001 ORDER BY allocation_percentage DESC;
SELECT portfolio_id, return_date, return_amount FROM investment_returns WHERE portfolio_id = 3001 ORDER BY return_date DESC LIMIT 3;
